front.title: SCIM Profile for Security Event Tokens

abstract.t: This specification defines a set of SCIM (System for Cross-domain Identity Management, RFC7643 and RFC7644) Security Events using the Security Event Token Specification (RFC8417) to enable the asynchronous exchange of messages between SCIM Service Providers and receivers. SCIM Security Events are typically used for: asynchronous request completion, resource replication, and provisioning co- ordination. This draft updates Section 5, of RFC7643 defining additional attributes for urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:core:2.0:ServiceProviderConfig schema. This draft updates RFC7644 with the optional new Asynchronous SCIM Request capability.
